subject: hotfix to prevent blank page if google is not accessible
commitMessage:
hotfix to prevent blank page if google is not accessible

This was useful for Tds14Sh demo in where google.com is not responding

Longer fix will be to open a local file that link to some websites

The reason why wikipedia is used and not tizen.org
is because it does link to other search engines (including google)

Change-Id: Ifec20f6fb1438bb210625effdae8391ff61d6cae
Signed-off-by: Philippe Coval <philippe.coval@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message:
